title: City of Sandy Springs to Host Springway Trail Ribbon Cutting
content: The City of Sandy Springs hopes to add a little spring in everybody’s step with the official opening of the Springway Trail. On Friday, May 2, at 1:00 p.m., the City will host a ribbon cutting ceremony for the highly anticipated trail – the first segment completed from its Trail Master Plan. ailable in the parking lot adjacent to the Morgan Falls Dog Park at 100 Morgan Falls Road.Parking for the event is av For more information about the trail, visit spr.gs/springway
